com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.utilities

Class StyledDocumentPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.utilities.StyledDocumentPrinter

  • public class StyledDocumentPrinter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles printing of javax.swing.text.StyledDocument instances.

    Lines are laid out regularly spaced vertically according to the end of line separator (which is guessed automatically if not specified using the setEndOfLineMarker method). Line endings can occur either at styles crossings or embedded within spans of text using the same style. There is no line wrapping at all (only line endings are used to layout the lines).

    Not all style attributes defined in javax.swing.text.StyleConstants

    are handled yet. Here is a list of supported features:

    • all attributes directly induced by the font choice (FontFamily, FontSize, Bold, Italic)
    • Underline
    • StrikeThrough
    • Foreground
    • Background

      • setEndOfLineMarker

        public void setEndOfLineMarker(java.lang.String endOfLineMarker)
        Set up the end of line marker.

        If this method is not called, the end of line marker will be guessed at print time.

        Parameters:
        endOfLineMarker - end of line marker to use

      • printDocument

        public void printDocument(javax.print.attribute.PrintRequestAttributeSet attributeSet)
        Print the document.

        Printing is done in a devoted thread, so this methods returns immediately.

        Parameters:
        attributeSet - set of attributes used to select the print service (may be null)
